projects.title: E-commerce Page
projects.description: Product page for an e-commerce shop including an image gallery, lightbox, and shopping cart

projects.title: Product Widgets
projects.description: Interactive widgets for different products. Users can tweak their settings, as well as update their profile

projects.title: Toast Notifications
projects.description: A small project to mimic toast notifications. Each notification disappears after 5 seconds or upon click.

faq.question: What experience do you have in software development?
faq.answer: I've been coding on and off for a couple years, predominantly in the frontend using tools like React, TypeScript, and Tailwind quite frequently. I've also picked up a bunch of other technologies as and when needed.

faq.question: What do you enjoy about coding?
faq.answer: The iteration. I have a background in video editing and it feels very familiar in that sense - constant refining and polishing to get things just right.

faq.question: What are you looking for?
faq.answer: Ideally, an apprenticeship where I can hit the ground running, as well as grow into the role and become a seasoned developer down the line.
